security: Revealing plans to share debriefing information with COLARRIAGA could compromise intelligence sources or methods. Quoting directly: "CLEARED FOR PASSAGE TO LIAISON? IF SO, PLAN GIVE PRESENT COPY TO COLARRIAGA PLS ADVISE. IF AFFIRMATIVE, PLS SEND ADDITIONAL COPY FOR STATION. RETENTION."
summary: A message regarding the debriefing of AMUG-1 and whether to forward the Spanish version to a liaison, specifically COLARRIAGA, and requesting advice and an additional copy for the station if approved.
summary_one_paragraph: This classified message discusses the debriefing of AMUG-1 and seeks guidance on providing the Spanish version of the debriefing (HGGW-3947) to a liaison named COLARRIAGA; it asks whether this action has been cleared and, if so, requests an additional copy for station retention.
title: AMUG-1 Debriefing (Spanish Version) Forwarded
